review_body: C1 ( 2014.08.14 ) This park was located in Hospitals for The Elderly, this hospital was the bigger in Korea. In this park, many stone statue was on display. The stone statue was described many celebrity, animal and monument. I was surprised because this park was bigger than I guess. But this park need many improvement. The road was muddy and the park was unclean. If there was improved, this park was good attraction, I think.
